process.name: OnProcess
process.description: Daily multi-node soil temperature and surface energy balance update using diurnal forcing, net radiation partitioning, boundary-layer conductance, and a tridiagonal (Thomas) solver.

inputs.name: physical_Thickness
inputs.description: Soil layer thickness by layer

inputs.name: physical_BD
inputs.description: Soil bulk density by layer

inputs.name: physical_Rocks
inputs.description: Rock fragment content by layer

inputs.name: physical_ParticleSizeSand
inputs.description: Sand fraction by layer

inputs.name: physical_ParticleSizeSilt
inputs.description: Silt fraction by layer

inputs.name: physical_ParticleSizeClay
inputs.description: Clay fraction by layer

inputs.name: organic_Carbon
inputs.description: Organic carbon content by layer

inputs.name: waterBalance_SW
inputs.description: Volumetric soil water content by layer

inputs.name: waterBalance_Salb
inputs.description: Soil surface albedo

inputs.name: waterBalance_Eo
inputs.description: Reference potential evaporation

inputs.name: waterBalance_Eos
inputs.description: Potential soil evaporation supply

inputs.name: waterBalance_Es
inputs.description: Actual soil evaporation

inputs.name: microClimate_CanopyHeight
inputs.description: Canopy height

inputs.name: weather_Tav
inputs.description: Mean annual air temperature

inputs.name: weather_Amp
inputs.description: Annual temperature amplitude

inputs.name: weather_Latitude
inputs.description: Site latitude

inputs.name: clock_Today_DayOfYear
inputs.description: Day of year

inputs.name: instrumHeight
inputs.description: Specified instrument (wind/temperature) height above surface

inputs.name: InitialValues
inputs.description: Optional initial soil temperatures for layers (top to bottom from topsoil node)

inputs.name: DepthToConstantTemperature
inputs.description: Depth at which seasonal temperature is constant

inputs.name: weather_MeanT
inputs.description: Daily mean air temperature

inputs.name: weather_MaxT
inputs.description: Daily maximum air temperature

inputs.name: weather_MinT
inputs.description: Daily minimum air temperature

inputs.name: weather_AirPressure
inputs.description: Mean sea level or station air pressure

inputs.name: weather_Radn
inputs.description: Daily global solar radiation

inputs.name: weather_Wind
inputs.description: Wind speed at instrument height

inputs.name: numLayers
inputs.description: Soil layer count (profile)

inputs.name: numNodes
inputs.description: Thermal nodes including phantom nodes (excl. air node)

inputs.name: nodeDepth
inputs.description: Depth of nodes (air, surface, and subsurface nodes)

inputs.name: thickness
inputs.description: Node/layer thickness array including phantom nodes

inputs.name: bulkDensity
inputs.description: Bulk density array including phantom nodes

inputs.name: rocks
inputs.description: Rock content array including phantom nodes

inputs.name: carbon
inputs.description: Organic carbon array including phantom nodes

inputs.name: sand
inputs.description: Sand content array including phantom nodes

inputs.name: silt
inputs.description: Silt content array including phantom nodes

inputs.name: clay
inputs.description: Clay content array including phantom nodes

inputs.name: soilWater
inputs.description: Current node/layer soil water (mapped) used for thermal property calculations

inputs.name: volSpecHeatSoil
inputs.description: Volumetric specific heat of soil at nodes

inputs.name: thermalConductivity
inputs.description: Effective soil thermal conductivity at nodes including air-node conductance

inputs.name: thermalConductance
inputs.description: Inter-nodal thermal conductance coefficients

inputs.name: heatStorage
inputs.description: Thermal storage term per node

inputs.name: soilTemp
inputs.description: Soil temperature at air/surface/subsurface nodes

inputs.name: newTemperature
inputs.description: Provisional updated node temperatures used in solver iterations

inputs.name: morningSoilTemp
inputs.description: Snapshot of soil temperatures around dawn (~5:00)

inputs.name: minSoilTemp
inputs.description: Daily minimum soil temperature per node

inputs.name: maxSoilTemp
inputs.description: Daily maximum soil temperature per node

inputs.name: aveSoilTemp
inputs.description: Daily mean soil temperature per node (accumulator)

inputs.name: boundaryLayerConductance
inputs.description: Daily accumulated boundary-layer conductance for heat at surface

inputs.name: airTemperature
inputs.description: Current air temperature used as upper boundary condition

inputs.name: netRadiation
inputs.description: Net radiation into soil used in heat flux balance (per internal step)

inputs.name: maxTempYesterday
inputs.description: Yesterday's maximum air temperature (for diurnal interpolation)

inputs.name: minTempYesterday
inputs.description: Yesterday's minimum air temperature (for diurnal interpolation)

inputs.name: doInitialisationStuff
inputs.description: Flag indicating first-day initialisation is pending

inputs.name: internalTimeStep
inputs.description: Internal integration time step

inputs.name: timeOfDaySecs
inputs.description: Current time-of-day within the daily loop

inputs.name: soilRoughnessHeight
inputs.description: Minimum aerodynamic roughness height used to set canopy height lower bound

inputs.name: canopyHeight
inputs.description: Canopy height used for boundary-layer conductance (max of microClimate height and roughness)

inputs.name: instrumentHeight
inputs.description: Instrument height used in conductance calculations (ensured >= canopyHeight + 0.5 m)

inputs.name: nu
inputs.description: Solver weighting factor (Crank–Nicolson parameter)

inputs.name: ps
inputs.description: Particle density of soil minerals

inputs.name: pom
inputs.description: Particle density of organic matter

inputs.name: soilConstituentNames
inputs.description: Ordered list of soil constituents used in thermal property mixing

inputs.name: timestep
inputs.description: External time step for daily loop

inputs.name: defaultTimeOfMaximumTemperature
inputs.description: Hour of daily maximum air temperature used in diurnal interpolation

inputs.name: boundarLayerConductanceSource
inputs.description: Boundary-layer conductance method (calc or constant)

inputs.name: netRadiationSource
inputs.description: Net radiation source (calc or eos)

outputs.name: soilTemp
outputs.description: Final node soil temperatures after daily integration

outputs.name: morningSoilTemp
outputs.description: Soil temperatures captured around dawn (~5:00)

outputs.name: minSoilTemp
outputs.description: Daily minimum soil temperature per node

outputs.name: maxSoilTemp
outputs.description: Daily maximum soil temperature per node

outputs.name: aveSoilTemp
outputs.description: Daily averaged soil temperature per node

outputs.name: boundaryLayerConductance
outputs.description: Accumulated boundary-layer conductance for heat at the surface

outputs.name: thermalConductivity
outputs.description: Effective thermal conductivity at nodes (including surface air-node conductance)

outputs.name: volSpecHeatSoil
outputs.description: Volumetric specific heat of soil at nodes

outputs.name: heatStorage
outputs.description: Thermal storage term per node used in solver

outputs.name: thermalConductance
outputs.description: Inter-nodal thermal conductance coefficients after update

outputs.name: newTemperature
outputs.description: Provisional node temperatures at end of day

outputs.name: internalTimeStep
outputs.description: Internal time step used during the day

outputs.name: timeOfDaySecs
outputs.description: Time-of-day counter at end of daily loop

outputs.name: airTemperature
outputs.description: Air temperature at the last internal step

outputs.name: netRadiation
outputs.description: Net radiation into soil for the last internal step

outputs.name: maxTempYesterday
outputs.description: Stored maximum air temperature of the current day for use on next day

outputs.name: minTempYesterday
outputs.description: Stored minimum air temperature of the current day for use on next day

outputs.name: canopyHeight
outputs.description: Canopy height used for conductance (m) after update

outputs.name: instrumentHeight
outputs.description: Instrument height used in conductance after enforcing minimum above canopy

outputs.name: doInitialisationStuff
outputs.description: Initialisation flag after first day (0=initialised)

functions.name: Divide
functions.description: Safe division with fallback value on zero denominator

functions.name: ValuesInArray
functions.description: Checks if array contains any valid (non-sentinel) numeric values

functions.name: Sum
functions.description: Partial sum of values between start and end indices, skipping sentinel

functions.name: Zero
functions.description: Zeroes all elements of an array

functions.name: ToCumThickness
functions.description: Computes cumulative thickness from layer thicknesses

functions.name: boundCheck
functions.description: Range check placeholder (no enforcement)

functions.name: volumetricFractionRocks
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of rocks

functions.name: volumetricFractionOrganicMatter
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of organic matter

functions.name: volumetricFractionSand
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of sand (corrected for rock and OM fractions)

functions.name: volumetricFractionSilt
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of silt (corrected for rock and OM fractions)

functions.name: volumetricFractionClay
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of clay (corrected for rock and OM fractions)

functions.name: volumetricFractionWater
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of water (corrected for OM fraction)

functions.name: volumetricFractionIce
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of ice (here zero)

functions.name: volumetricFractionAir
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of air as residual of other fractions

functions.name: volumetricSpecificHeat
functions.description: Returns constituent-specific volumetric heat capacity constants

functions.name: ThermalConductance
functions.description: Returns constituent property used for thermal mixing

functions.name: shapeFactor
functions.description: Shape factor for Maxwell–Eucken type mixing (phase geometry)

functions.name: airDensity
functions.description: Computes air density from temperature and pressure

functions.name: kelvinT
functions.description: Converts Celsius to Kelvin

functions.name: longWaveRadn
functions.description: Stefan–Boltzmann longwave radiation

functions.name: mapLayer2Node
functions.description: Maps layer values to nodes by depth-weighted interpolation

functions.name: doThermalConductivityCoeffs
functions.description: Computes soil thermal conductivity pedotransfer coefficients

functions.name: calcSoilTemperature
functions.description: Seasonal soil temperature profile by depth and phase shift

functions.name: calcLayerTemperature
functions.description: Analytic layer temperature with depth lag and exponential damping

functions.name: calcSurfaceTemperature
functions.description: Initial surface temperature from albedo, air temperature, and radiation

functions.name: doNetRadiation
functions.description: Diurnal distribution of solar radiation, cloud factor, and vapor constant

functions.name: interpolateNetRadiation
functions.description: Computes net soil radiation (shortwave+longwave) per internal step

functions.name: math_sin
functions.description: Wrapper for math.sin

functions.name: math_cos
functions.description: Wrapper for math.cos

functions.name: math_log
functions.description: Wrapper for math.log

functions.name: math_exp
functions.description: Wrapper for math.exp

functions.name: getBoundaryLayerConductance
functions.description: Iterative bulk boundary-layer conductance with stability corrections

functions.name: interpolateTemperature
functions.description: Diurnal air temperature interpolation using sinusoidal scheme

functions.name: doVolumetricSpecificHeat
functions.description: Computes volumetric specific heat at nodes from constituents and water

functions.name: doThermalConductivity
functions.description: Computes effective thermal conductivity at nodes from constituents

functions.name: doThomas
functions.description: Thomas algorithm to solve tridiagonal heat diffusion system

functions.name: doUpdate
functions.description: Updates min/max/mean soil temperatures and accumulates conductance

functions.name: getIniVariables
functions.description: Initial instrument height and input checks

functions.name: getProfileVariables
functions.description: Builds node/layer geometric and property arrays (adds phantom nodes)

functions.name: readParam
functions.description: Computes thermal parameters and initial seasonal temperature profile

functions.name: OnStartOfSimulation
functions.description: Initialises state, profile, parameters, and starting temperatures

functions.name: OnProcess
functions.description: Main daily loop: radiation, boundary-layer conductance, heat diffusion
